threads.title: Cultural Safety App for Medical Supervision
threads.excerpt:
# Cultural Safety App for Medical Supervision

**Summary:** **Conversation Overview**

The user is working on developing a cultural safety training app for medical supervisors to address systemic raci

learnings.summary: Methodology: The app emphasized moving beyond traditional cultural awareness training to address systemic racism
learnings.details:
The app emphasized moving beyond traditional cultural awareness training to address systemic racism through evidence-based approaches, community-led design, and practical integration with existing healthcare workflows. This sits within the broader National Scheme 2020–2025 Strategy aiming to make cultural safety the norm and eliminate systemic and interpersonal racism. Content:

Historical health disparities and Close the Gap context

Definitions of cultural safety, difference from cultural competence/capability

Legal and regulatory framework (AHPRA Strategy, National Law)


Format: Self‑paced with reflection prompts
learnings.evidence: The app emphasized moving beyond traditional cultural awareness training to address systemic racism through evidence-based approaches, community-led design, and practical integration with existing healthcare workflows

thinking_patterns.exploration_style: Deep dive - thorough exploration of topics
